query:
UPDATE source_sync_state
        SET sync_status = 'idle',
            last_sync_at = ?,
            current_operation = NULL,
            current_item = NULL,
            tracks_uploaded = ?,
            tracks_downloaded = ?,
            tracks_updated = ?,
            tracks_deleted = ?,
            server_sync_token = COALESCE(?, server_sync_token),
            error_message = NULL,
            updated_at = datetime('now')
        WHERE source_id = ? AND user_id = ?
